MESSAGE.value: Start setting up SASS, update makefile for new ssh target dir, continue building out base.html.
Fix @import statements in style.scss and line endings in _type.scss.
Add base module for typography and color elements, and import them to style.scss.
Remove extraneous comments from top of stylesheet.
Add IDEA project files (no reason not to).
Start building out the very basics of the article template, and add templates/class and templates/devotions with custom content for those page types.

Start building out site templates. - add a watcher task for generating SASS automatically in IDEA. - add ADN, OpenGraph, and Twitter settings - add a mixins SASS stylesheet - start building out base styles for updated/tweaked chriskrycho.com - add more configuration elements (as learned from setting up winningslowly.org)
Remove podcasting elements accidentally brought over from WS template.
Continue building out basics of template.
Start building archives template, from which the index will inherit (unless I do a landing page instead).
Add font family settings and start defining link styles. - Minion stack - Cronos stack - easeInOutCubic bezier curve variable and transform mixin
Start configuring things on the dev branch for the new theme. This way I can develop the theme and test it fully in parallel, constantly merging in the updated content from the main branch.
Update font size and scale information.
